segments.text: Did you call for a car service
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at the moment . Where would you like me to take you
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am going to the airport , and I have to catch the 930 flight to New York .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's a long way and there is roadwork near Broadway . I am not sure I can snake it in half an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I can't miss the flight . It's an important meeting and it ’ s waiting for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , I will try my best . If there aren ’ t any holdups , I think we can get there in time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . How much is it to the airport
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . Will you please help me with the luggage
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes , sure . Let me put it in the boot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all . Bang the door , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are in luck . The traffic is not heavy today .
segments.speaker: S2
